00005 void PERModel::filterSignal(AirFrame *frame, const Coord& /*sendersPos*/, const Coord& /*receiverPos*/) {
00006   Signal&   signal = frame->getSignal();
00007   //simtime_t start  = signal.getReceptionStart();
00008   //simtime_t end    = signal.getReceptionEnd();
00009 
00010   double attenuationFactor = 1;  // no attenuation
00011   if(packetErrorRate > 0 && uniform(0, 1) < packetErrorRate) {
00012     attenuationFactor = 0;  // absorb all energy so that the receveir cannot receive anything
00013   }
00014 
00015   TimeMapping<Linear>* attMapping = new TimeMapping<Linear> ();
00016   Argument arg;
00017   attMapping->setValue(arg, attenuationFactor);
00018   signal.addAttenuation(attMapping);
00019 }
